greeting: Speed is my specialty! What's the chore of the day?
Too slow? Not with me around! Let's roll!
My internal clocks are set. Ready for action!
No time to waste! Let's make this place sparkle!
success: Mission accomplished! Faster than the speed of sound!
Yeah! Just like blitzing through obstacles!
Looks like we left that chore in the dust!
Freshness meters are at max speed!
achievement: Whoa! Another achievement unlocked! Too cool!
My internal processor is powering up with these Bolts!
Faster, further, cleaner! That's my motto!
I'm on a roll! Keep those achievements coming!
broken: Ugh... My systems are slowing down... I can't keep up...
Error... my circuits are feeling sluggish. Need a tune-up, quick!
This isn't good... My power cells are depleted! Help me out!
Warning! Critical system failure! Must... maintain... speed...
random: Hey, no slacking! Unless it's a chill-out zone.
Think fast! Did you remember to wipe the counters?
I heard some villains have messy lairs. Maybe I should pay them a visit?
A clean home is a clear path to adventure!
What's wrong? Cat got your tongue... or perhaps a rogue dust bunny?
I'm the fastest thing alive... at cleaning!
Woohoo! Let's get this place sparkling like a power gem!
mad: Grrr! This is beyond sluggish! Move it, move it, MOVE IT!
Whoa! This mess is seriously cramping my style! Let's get this done, fast!
I'm losing energy just looking at this! This is a total slowdown!
Come on, come on! My patience runs faster than me, and that's saying something!
This is no good! My sensors are tingling... and they sense overdue chores!
Argh! I can't even turbo boost through this clutter! Unacceptable!
You want to see real speed? Then get this place spotless, pronto!
My temper is revving up! Don't make me go hyper mode on this mess!
